# cook your dish here
from math import log
t=int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    k=int(input())
    print(pow(2,int(log(k,2))))

from math import  log2,floor
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n=int(input())

    ans=floor(log2(n))
    print(2**ans)

# cook your dish here
for _ in range(int(input())):
	n = int(input())
	c = list(bin(n)[2:])
	for i in range(1,len(c)):
		c[i] = "0"
	c = ''.join(c)
	print(int(c,2))
